description: This file defines the AppTheme class which provides static methods to generate custom ThemeData objects for Flutter applications. Specifically, it contains a method for creating a light theme with optional high contrast styling based on a predefined style guide and Material 3 design standards.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to generate themed styles for a Flutter application.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Generates a ThemeData object configured for a light theme with optional high contrast styling, based on predefined color schemes and material design parameters.
